messages.subject: Re: Introduction (Paula Long/PeasMom)
messages.msgSnippet: Paula I saw your intro and find it so funny after moving so far away I find someone who lived near me. Ok here it is. We used to live in Kingwood.  Now we live
messages.messageBody:
Paula
I saw your intro and find it so funny after moving so far away I find someone who lived near me.
Ok here it is. We used to live in Kingwood. Now we live on a farm in upstate New York. I kept up with HUG and WISE and atended the Minful Confrence.
Hope all is well in Texas we have tons of SNOW!!!
Stephanie
Sam(5 on Valentines Day)

messages.subject: Re: Introduction (Paula Long/PeasMom)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Paula, I wanted to welcome you I am a newbie too and also lost a child at birth the day I became a mother I lost my first born twin due to a cord accident..
messages.messageBody:
Hi Paula,
I wanted to welcome you I am a newbie too and also lost a child at birth the
day I became a mother I lost my first born twin due to a cord accident.. I
know that the impact of this loss has probably changed you forever and like
myself has encouraged me to search for alternatives to letting others have
control over my surviving children.I have found this list a lot of fun and
also meeting some wonderful like minded people in just a few short weeks.
and have even learned how to not get my books wet when I read to relax in
the bathtub! I look forward to hearing more about your unschooling
adventures with your daughter Alexandria.
Beth
Mother to identical twins Melissa Rose and Lauren Elizabeth (stillborn 1/92)
due to misdiagnosed monoamniotic
pregnancy at 36 and a half weeks gestation and their premie brother Kyle
born at 32 weeks on Jan. 1993

messages.subject: Introduction (Paula Long/PeasMom)
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I just joined this list - and although I m *sure* there are people I know here, I m sending my intro too soon to know for sure... My name is
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone,

I just joined this list - and although I'm *sure* there are people I know
here, I'm sending my intro too soon to know for sure...

My name is Paula Long, and I live in Dickinson, Texas, which is just a tad
south of Houston and the Clear Lake (NASA) area, with my husband Scott. We
have a daughter Alexandria, who turned 4 in November. We also have a son,
Kadin, who was born still July of 1998.

We parent in the style of attachment parenting, and I've known I would
homeschool since before I ever had children. It wasn't until about 3.5
years ago that I learned of unschooling - and I knew the moment I heard of
it that that would be perfect for our family as it's just an extention of
what we were doing already.

I recently became a member of a Houston unschooling group, but I wanted to
join together with more unschooling families as we continue our journey.

~Paula


*********************************************************************
Paula Long (aka PeasMom)
Mommy to Alexandria (11/20/95) and Kadin (born still 07/29/98)
Personal Parenting ~ http://www.kjsl.com/~peasmom
*********************************************************************
PeaVine ~ http://www.peavineonline.com
APStuff! ~ http://www.kjsl.com/~apstuff
Honored Babies ~ http://www.kjsl.com/~honored
*****************************************************
